indications:
Indications post-exposure prophylaxis against rabies
infection
name: RABIES IMMUNOGLOBULIN
cautions: Cautions IgA deficiency; interference with live virus vaccines—see under Normal Immunoglobulin
side-effects:
Side-effects injection site swelling and pain; very
rarely anaphylaxis; buccal ulceration, glossitis, chest tightness,
dyspnoea, tremor, dizziness, arthralgia, and facial oedema also reported
